
#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;
int n,m;
int rbest;
int dbest;
int input;
int main(){
   cin >> n >> m;
   int first = 1;
   for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
      int rowfirst = 1;
      for(int j = 0; j < m; j++){
         cin >> input;
         if(rowfirst) {rbest = input; rowfirst = 0;}
         else {
            if(rbest > input){
               rbest = input;
            }
         }
      }
      if(first){
         dbest = rbest;
         first = 0;
      } else {
         if(dbest < rbest){
            dbest = rbest;
         }
      }
   }
   cout << dbest <<endl;
   return 0;
}
